meanings.definition: A bag used for carrying books.
meanings.sent1: I see many students with bookbags at school.
meanings.sent2: My sister's bookbag is pink and has a unicorn on it.
meanings.sent3: The bookbags in the store were all different colors and sizes.
meanings.sent4: Her overflowing bookbag was like a portable library.
meanings.sent5: Carrying heavy bookbags every day can strain your back.

meanings.definition: To put books in a bag for carrying.
meanings.sent1: I need to bookbags my textbooks for school tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She bookbags her novels carefully to prevent them from getting damaged.
meanings.sent3: He bookbags his books quickly before heading out to the library.
meanings.sent4: The librarian asked me to bookbags the borrowed books by the end of the week.
meanings.sent5: Remember to bookbags your books neatly to fit them all in the bag.
